title: What are some examples of songs that switch from a minor key to the major key (Like C minor to C major) or vice versa? - Quora

response.answer_text: I don’t play guitar much but I do study about it as well as bass. There are numerous songs that switch such as; Chuck Berry’s - Johnny B Goode, Black Sabbath’s - Iron Man, Lynyrd Skynyrd - Sweet Home Alabama, Guns N Roses - Sweet Child O Mine, and Stray Cats - Stray Cat Strut (but the list goes on and on).
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Daniel James Sankarsingh

response.answer_text: Parallel key modulations are common in pieces in minor keys; they typically modulate back to the minor key at the end. For just one example, “Romanza” begins in E minor, moves to E major, and then returns to E minor:
